channel.title: 世界 - 最新 - Google新闻

item.title: 以色列中的伊朗导弹袭击至少8个；国防部长警告“德黑兰将燃烧” - 福克斯新闻
item.description: 以色列杀害伊朗导弹罢工至少8；国防部长警告说，“德黑兰将燃烧” ＆nbsp;＆nbsp; fox news 实时更新：伊朗和以色列交易罢工，因为冲突狂暴＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 至少有八人在以色列袭击以色列袭击时，将德黑兰石油仓库设置在火上 - 实时更新＆nbsp;＆nbsp; href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmib0fvx3lxte4zq01lwndqnerekjesnekjymgz0c2jenznoa2jiym4xwmfmm2 G4YVBPQTB3TTHTZ1HAAENZY3PXBMM1CZFHBHUZRRRR5MDFZEKLDBURSDZNDMUDENV91SEW4NJHQAUZVVHPXSTVHPXSTVUBHFPNHFCSQ？ target =“ _ blank”>实时更新：以色列在核网站上罢工后，伊朗在以色列发射导弹 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipwFBVV95cUxOUG5YY1JNOWF0a0stOFVXU1JIdnZWcWVBQ0x5akRzMTFXZi14YllRUnVER0ZOYTAzLS1YNUdtY24wWUF4 ZFBLdUJqWUMwaXo1M3hHRWdaYk83Wkg2akRjTjFxcl9VWURLUEM3aXpaeTI0ODZzSVRmT0dQTVpwbFRZQnJvODY2cXVMU1VwOElzNUEzWGNINnI2ZGwwT1E0bG5VYkVmT1dodw?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>俄罗斯与以色列和伊朗的紧密联系可以帮助它成为一个权力经纪人＆nbsp; nbsp; ap ap news ap news

item.title: 乌克兰战争简报：普京在电话中告诉特朗普莫斯科准备恢复和平谈判 - 监护人
item.description: 乌克兰战争简报：普京告诉特朗普在电话中告诉莫斯科恢复和平谈判＆nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmie0fvx3lxte1qedz2zhz2zhz6r2vxmwznsgjuwfy4q3fwc2hrt1hrt1hrt1 hrt1qtag9uzmrpnxq0q0q1 l3agx2adrxekhiwd1strqvs1rcs1imwljmjfumenumnumnumnumnumpvn3vacl8zz1plegf0mer0mezjyuvxwlp0mdvrc0jsnhkwqlv qlv Qlv4nnnnnnnnnnnnpvx2ddwoa？ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普：以色列和伊朗之间的战争应结束＆nbsp;＆nbsp; axios 乌克兰无人机破坏了被占领的Zaporizhzhia Oblast摧毁俄罗斯防空系统，军事情报说＆nbsp; nbsp; KYIV独立 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirgFBVV95cUxOcnJ5QXdmOFFyMml4UWh5Q2s4RVBWM0VLSUpQVXFlZjdSVXBsRzZ0NmRtX0ZSenFmckMwQzNDcGZzNUJmdzY0T uy0dwdpx1v0ajrzq0vrd3lfx2nkqwlyywjcdhptujnmcwd4ukdxn2nwynl2u2u2u2u2u2 hnbgnyvvu3s EPVQJK5EXDNTKNUNF9TMHDODVAXSFL1OGDBQULRSXP3ZE9BCMN0QU5LEJDJDJZVZFU0E？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>普京对特朗普说话，谴责以色列对伊朗的罢工，克里姆林宫说＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmisafbvv95cuxpcwzlajjpwtmyzgvnphdphdg81vzmwnphdg81vzvyyy2n2c2c2c2c2c2lkvll3zgjnyu2r3znyu2r3znyuu55 ggtgtgtgtgtgtgwymarmdtgwwyt5 tgwyt5tgwyt5tgwytfymarmarmarmarmarmdtfyfwikwwyfigwyfwiy fikwwikwwytfikwew.c.figwyw.cwwyfigwy fikwy FES16BGROA3HJN2DRUGTGBNC5QZNHXY1MRVZPRKD6WNZTQLRMTHJJN0JXUV9SU2RCNG hvmnlqymp3dknsmvbl9utdbfmwduqk1zwwjfdngwourtwfqwa3zyandmav9jmfdnx1 92S1hRcjh4RlZyY9IBtgFBVV95cUxOQ2xWSjhrUlFOd0pYdDB2ZVU3YjFaN3dhN29JbDNwOThJSGpic3RjMDRWem9WbGprSDRYUHpKNGltanpPWE5VWDhQV2dhbV9FODFFbXFkR vnwzmjkyu5gwhpvr2powuo2vky2ykw4svz3y2uwdefwdefwczrlbwlvzc1yx1yx1vltefgek5w R0TVVGDVSFBKA21WDXZPMTVTEDRJAGJHNDZTEGXSZFNETTJIQKLXWM5QUFBHUQ？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>普京和特朗普讨论了中东紧张局势，乌克兰战争，电话＆nbsp; ABC News

item.title: 特朗普政府认为将36个国家 /地区添加到旅行禁令名单 - 华盛顿邮报
item.description: 特朗普政府认为添加36个国家/地区的旅行列表＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 特朗普旅行禁令：AZ倡导者分享难民家庭的担忧＆nbsp; nbsp; fox 10 Phoenix 随着旅行禁令的开始，西澳移民竞赛与家庭团聚href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijwfbvv95cuxqdxhqdxhqoujfbhrxtnrvq1ntcdg3mnnnnn4skrskrsnhjwosnhjwos1kroodv5qnvxvv5qnvxvv G9VWETDNWDYDTQ5EGTIEUEJWSZDPV3LPRU9PDK93WWWTUZ054MTVIRMG5A0NKTUXWC3RMBDA1VURIZMPFCVDWYUUJRC2JWRNDVZERNDVZEVZEVFEFNTJLVNTJLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVSCWNWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW mlrywhjqvjhovffffffffwdiblafbvv95cuxnzho2qy1uenvsvfkxnddsswmr3rkzhdtc1vhduprv2xkwxvrvrvrvrvrvrvrvrvrvrvrvv3nfvdzybfrwggnbfrwggng9otxrsoenhrsoenhrsoenhrsoenhr0m2z2z2otv 0pvvjjjiCvnmmMJ3OHBFCKVZDEHQTDVACHHNNNKHQOG01OG4WUMVKR3FTNUWYRGHWYRGHWBLFNSDF5RKPYBPYBTIZVMZSDM011E11EHHHHHHHHVZ1ZVC1VC1VC1VC1VC1VC1VC1VWTGVX？ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普的旅行禁令燃料绝望和对密歇根州阿拉伯美国人的政治厌恶href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmipafbvv95cuxpa2zoa2zoa19yr1h3akdic09vtejwy01stmpvnxfmsvnxfmsvnxfmsvnxfmsvnxfmsvnsfms vnxfms nraelrqwg3cefrlv9ttvjuu25xdu91sgf0tmlowdj6mde4wgxgrm94cm1vevffmhhnonzniclvbrgrgyts3dats1kvlfpbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfyas13bjccc0erputip = oc = occyr = target =“ _ blank”>特朗普正在考虑将另外36个国家/地区添加到他的无旅行名单中，包括非洲和加勒比国家：报告＆nbsp; nbsp; 独立

item.title: 英国同意对儿童性虐待进行新的调查 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 英国的Starmer宣布全国询问'美容帮派' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmirwfbvv95cuxpm1e3svg0rvzrdwgtac1rznrqvzzytusdrgzzzytu1xnrgzzzytu1xndrg1 trg1 rovwwzsjd1dmjpcghmnmszci1qcxfru2dsbzv4nfjimm03x1zyz2kytmnkcvm1akjsa mzavuzrtu5ktwfdu2d3odjqd0dyn3jtwnzkytlhnmz4wes0q1z5udzkzkzwjywnljvhk5 alNUVlkzeEN5ZnVz0gG0AUFVX3lxTE1ZZ1NfZjFHZUVKbWR6UkkyYzhiVk4xTllzNC1jMWo3b3NjYmRuRkhQSjRBbXZYZzRLamJRSGJ2cVo5NnJjSzFHWmItSWc2OTIwRllEN0 tszmlulwjonflqq09oemh6v3dimf9ys21odhazx3u5a292dexsu2tfwmtwri1sseh5vfp6euvjn1luvjn1plurga3dha1plurga3dha1mnwb3bttvc1mnwdktjnftjnftjnft2ppssosksskszndduxzndwwt2psosksaksksaksaksamsksamsksamsksamsksaM target =“ _ blank”>英国，要在马斯克的压力＆nbsp; nbsp; ABC News 凯尔·斯塔默（Keir Starmer）爵士宣布国家调查对美容帮派的调查＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipwFBVV95cUxNVHdkQUthbzJad1FQaldoSmNyZHBKbTViR3Bsd1ZldW5TQzdVdWJPemR1blVaa3EzMEVCLTVDSWJfcE1W nnhfx3y5m0ravhbsqxlnujvjthhfqufyafr6sw9wtdz3wtdz3wtdbclborezurjgxn0r0r0vuzhqm E1MZJLTMK4CXVFCXNRV2HDVFLCWWW9VTKO0V04TVLZRNNNTVTR3D3LACDJOTKSZOA？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>为什么许多受害者都欢迎全国性调查梳理帮派＆nbsp; nbsp; Sky News

item.title: 等待身体加深印度空气崩溃后家庭的痛苦-BBC
item.description: 等待身体加深印度空气崩溃后家庭的疼痛 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxQbS0taXk4YjFkclpUNFFjSk42QVNJaTNZUThiZkpIYks0U0Z2ZFBObmsxdkd4dERfSWRtLS1FVUFRblNDTX fpyjbksjhgy0dwvu9ix3zsawflrgdnoe9vvdhobwkyd002nlqts0hqccvuz1pmuhl0q1c4t mrhcgdqc2pub2dsbfdvnmdwu2rksefnogrvelz6z2vvsggzulrgnldvmtr4t1uzzw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>座位11A中的乘客如何成为印度空气崩溃的唯一幸存者＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmivafbvv95cuxpstf0rjr0qknrszq1m GPIEG1TEGNPWLHHC25ZEE5MRVBJDW15AFU3VMPYN2TFS2GXD3Q2NVL6ADDVREVFRFLFMVBAYTQ0TU 9JRJDYZ01VQ2HVBVHMCGQXR0F4MMFFCKXTCZF5K13VJNKAWMXZFVUSK5CVTNWOWFHOWFHYK9JRZZXX2N CR1U5AMEXQMU2YMJ3NG8WMU56QMD6AK5XUFRWQVQ1SKE3AF9LA0XIAMHGN0K0K0TWPSS3VTRW？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>印度空气崩溃：随着家庭等待亲戚的剩余＆nbsp; nbsp; sky News <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqAFBVV95cUxPY0Jia0tLTnVINThZMnAzTXY2azdmQTBqNThSNmhramtXczgyNFVEcGN5OXd1MVJrbHVVbllvTmpwLWxfN W16MVP1QWNVMTVJEXL4D1RJSDRXAJL2UF9JSHBGUJK1WHJ2BC1PA1PA1N0ETJJJCLRTSTDNDVI YZ0H1QZH5BVL3S1RRUU5KCUT1CEFLQXN4MDJKDEV4BTBLDZFPSE8ZODI2WGZNC04？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>为波音经理噩梦造成的梦想平行人物之一刚刚崩溃＆nbsp; 美国前景 在新空气印度崩溃理论中怀疑的副驾驶错误＆nbsp;＆nbsp; yahoo
